attributes.action: Pay ALL charity money from the National Lottery into the NHS!
attributes.additional_details: http://www.independent.co.uk/news/royal-opera-house-wins-up-to-pounds-78m-lottery-cash-1592417.html    This and other recipients like this DO NOT BENEFIT THE COUNTRY!
attributes.background: While the National Lottery supports many different charities, it does not benefit the Country as a whole, but this way we ALL would benefit!
